attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To hold a true and fair Referendum on the Treaty of Lisbon.  This is a Treaty that is indeed Constitutional and will alter our way of life here in the United Kingdom for the present generation and future Generations to come.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
